original_text: So she wrote letters in Ahab's name, and sealed them with his seal, and sent the letters unto the elders and to the nobles that were in his city, dwelling with Naboth.
korean_text: 아합의 이름으로 편지들을 쓰고 그 인을 치고 봉하여 그의 성읍에서 나봇과 함께 사는 장로와 귀족들에게 보내니

sentences.original_text: So she wrote letters in Ahab's name
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 아합의 이름으로 편지를 썼습니다

sentences.original_text: and sealed them with his seal
and sent the letters unto elders
